title: Career Summary
content: Samuel A. Kirk has 45+ years in Silicon Valley developing software and firmware tests for hardware and software, power-on self-test (POST) firmware, online and off-line diagnostic software, mixed-signal hardware testing, and data visualization.

title: Employment History
content:
Chief Consulting Engineer at SAK Consulting (3/2022-present)
- AI-assisted software development, genAI applied to testing and documentation
- Technologies: Python, Next.js, Cursor, Claude Code, Vertex AI

Test Engineer III at Talis BioMedical (2/2020-3/2022)
- Medical point-of-care test instruments using Python

Sr. Diagnostic Software Engineer at Cadence Design Systems (10/2015-3/2017)
- Hi-speed digital logic emulation, test station construction using Python, BeagleBone Black

title: Skills
content:
Python: 8+ years
C: 15+ years
Linux/Unix: Continuous since 1980
Domains: Medical point-of-care, Automotive OTA, ATE Systems, Servers, Digital Audio, SSDs
Location: Fremont, CA
